name: HellTaker: The Second Circle
description: You may have conquered Hell and Taken the girls from it, but now a much more daunting task is upon you. Domestic Dates with Demon Girls. Get to know each of your favorite waifus from HellTaker and build up your relationships with each of them. Who knows, the girls may even reward you for your efforts. Thanks for checking out our demos guys. I hope you'll stick around for the future.
